data.lore: Greatness comes in all shapes and sizes, as proven by this diminutive, cannon-wieldingÂ yordle. In a world fraught with turmoil, Tristana refuses to back down from any challenge. She represents the pinnacle of martial proficiency, unwavering courage, and boundless optimism. For Trist and her gun, Boomer, every mission is a chance to prove that heroes do exist.
data.name: Tristana
data.title: the Yordle Gunner

spells.tooltip:
Passive: Rapid Fire's cooldown is reduced by {{ e3 }} seconds each time Tristana basic attacks an enemy marked with Explosive Charge.

Explosive Charge's cooldown is reduced by {{ e4 }} seconds each time Tristana basic attacks an enemy when her Rapid Fire is active (doubled effect against champions).

Active: Increases Tristana's Attack Speed by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds.
spells.description: Tristana fires her weapon rapidly, increasing her Attack Speed for a short time. Shooting enemies marked with Explosive Charge reduces the cooldown by a small amount each hit.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Passive: Rapid Fire's cooldown is reduced by {{ e3 }} seconds each time Tristana basic attacks an enemy marked with Explosive Charge. Explosive Charge's cooldown is reduced by {{ e4 }} seconds each time Tristana basic attacks an enemy when her Rapid Fire is active (doubled effect against champions). Active: Increases Tristana's Attack Speed by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds.
spells.name: Rapid Fire
spells.sanitizedDescription: Tristana fires her weapon rapidly, increasing her Attack Speed for a short time. Shooting enemies marked with Explosive Charge reduces the cooldown by a small amount each hit.

spells.tooltip:
Tristana fires at the ground to propel her to target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and slowing surrounding enemy units by 60% for {{ e3 }} second(s).

Rocket Jump's damage is increased if Tristana lands on an enemy unit affected with Explosive Charge (25% bonus per stack), and explodes the Explosive Charge immediately if it has 4 stacks.

On a champion kill or assist, Rocket Jump's cooldown resets.
spells.description: Tristana fires at the ground to propel her to a distant location, dealing damage and slowing surrounding units for a brief period where she lands.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Tristana fires at the ground to propel her to target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and slowing surrounding enemy units by 60% for {{ e3 }} second(s). Rocket Jump's damage is increased if Tristana lands on an enemy unit affected with Explosive Charge (25% bonus per stack), and explodes the Explosive Charge immediately if it has 4 stacks. On a champion kill or assist, Rocket Jump's cooldown resets.
spells.name: Rocket Jump
spells.sanitizedDescription: Tristana fires at the ground to propel her to a distant location, dealing damage and slowing surrounding units for a brief period where she lands.

spells.tooltip:
Passive: Enemies explode when slain by Tristana's basic attacks, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Magic Damage to nearby enemies.

Active: Places a charge on target enemy or turret that explodes after 4 seconds, dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) Physical Damage to nearby enemies.

Tristana's basic attacks against the target increase the charge's damage by {{ e8 }}%, stacking up to 4 times. If Tristana basic attacks a target with 4 stacks, the charge explodes immediately. The detonation radius is twice as large if used on a turret.
spells.description: When Tristana kills a unit, her cannonballs burst into shrapnel, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Can be activated to place a bomb on a target enemy that explodes after a short duration dealing damage to surrounding units.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Passive: Enemies explode when slain by Tristana's basic attacks, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Magic Damage to nearby enemies. Active: Places a charge on target enemy or turret that explodes after 4 seconds, dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) Physical Damage to nearby enemies. Tristana's basic attacks against the target increase the charge's damage by {{ e8 }}%, stacking up to 4 times. If Tristana basic attacks a target with 4 stacks, the charge explodes immediately. The detonation radius is twice as large if used on a turret.
spells.name: Explosive Charge
spells.sanitizedDescription: When Tristana kills a unit, her cannonballs burst into shrapnel, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Can be activated to place a bomb on a target enemy that explodes after a short duration dealing damage to surrounding units.

spells.tooltip: Tristana fires a massive cannonball at an enemy unit. This deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and knocks surrounding units back {{ e2 }} distance.
spells.description: Tristana loads a massive cannonball into her weapon and fires it at an enemy unit. This deals Magic Damage and knocks the target back.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Tristana fires a massive cannonball at an enemy unit. This deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and knocks surrounding units back {{ e2 }} distance.
spells.name: Buster Shot
spells.sanitizedDescription: Tristana loads a massive cannonball into her weapon and fires it at an enemy unit. This deals Magic Damage and knocks the target back.

passive.name: Draw a Bead
passive.description: Increases Tristana's Attack Range as she levels.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Increases Tristana's Attack Range as she levels.
